description: This course is about how to create a website using WordPress, but the difference that this course has is we focus on building clean and conversion focused website or blog, you can learn how to blog and create your website easily using WordPress platform, We will talk about Thrive Themes in this course, it will only take one or two days to learn the whole course and apply it. it's a practical course which means teach you every step in details. the structure of this course is from beginning to more advanced phase. if you take this you'll learn how to build blogs easily and effortlessly, for any kind of business.
title: Create a Conversion Focused Blog/Website with WordPress
